audience_card.name: Kinetic Shutter Card
audience_card.description: A modern, immersive card that replaces glassmorphism with high-contrast gradients and kinetic typography. It focuses on the image and the emotional connection.

structure.container: group relative h-[500px] w-full overflow-hidden rounded-2xl border border-white/10 bg-gray-900 shadow-xl
structure.image_layer: absolute inset-0 h-full w-full bg-cover bg-center transition-transform duration-700 ease-out group-hover:scale-110
structure.gradient_overlay: absolute inset-0 bg-gradient-to-t from-black via-black/60 to-transparent opacity-90 transition-opacity duration-500 group-hover:opacity-95
structure.content_wrapper: absolute inset-0 flex flex-col justify-end p-8
structure.text_container: relative z-10 transform transition-transform duration-500 group-hover:-translate-y-2
structure.accent_line: h-1 w-12 mb-4 transition-all duration-500 group-hover:w-24
structure.title: font-oswald text-3xl font-bold uppercase tracking-tight text-white mb-3 drop-shadow-lg
structure.description: font-manrope text-base text-gray-300 mb-6 opacity-90 max-w-xs
structure.cta_wrapper: flex items-center gap-3 opacity-80 group-hover:opacity-100 transition-opacity duration-300

instructions_to_main_agent: Replace the existing 3 cards with the new 'Kinetic Shutter Card' design defined above.
REMOVE the inner 'glassmorphism' div (the one with bg-white/10 backdrop-blur-md).
Ensure the text is directly on the gradient overlay, not inside a box.
Use the specific image URLs provided in the variants.
Apply the specific color themes (Accent for Grand Public, Secondary for Women, Primary for Pros).
Ensure the 'Pour Qui ?' title section remains unchanged.
Add data-testid attributes to the new cards (e.g., 'audience-card-public', 'audience-card-women', 'audience-card-pro').
Maintain the responsive grid layout (grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3).
universal_guidelines: Do not use 'glassmorphism' classes for these specific cards.
Ensure high contrast for text over images using the gradient overlay.
Use 'group' and 'group-hover' classes for the interaction effects.
Keep the 'Oswald' font for titles to match the martial arts brand identity.
